original_text: And the host shall stone them and cut them down with their swords. They shall kill their sons and their daughters, and burn up their houses.
korean_text: 무리가 그들을 돌로 치며 칼로 죽이고 그 자녀도 죽이며 그 집들을 불사르리라

sentences.original_text: And the host shall stone them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 군대가 그들을 돌로 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: and cut them down with their swords
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 칼로 그들을 베어 넘길 것이며
